3.Pros: Working for here is fun and most of the customers are wonderful to service. Most of your co workers are very helpful and your nervous feeling starts to go away fairly quickly. You also get unlimited free wifi which is a huge plus to you if you are on your break or lunch because you can enjoy your time on the enternet instead of just sitting there bored. So if your house/apartment searching you will definently enjoy that.
3.Cons: You will have to deal with some rude customers but the wonderful enjoyable customers will make you have a better day and smile that's for sure. You get short breaks but lunch breaks are better just make sure that you keep on your manager to know when your breaks and lunchs are or you wont one half the time. Be prepared to deal with some pretty crazy and uncomfortable situations to happen in the restaurant because that's just part of working for there but on the god side its not that often and it usually doesn't get too bad.
